For each approved cell phone received, your collection location will be awarded TerraCycle points. Visit the Cell Phone Brigade page for details."

name: Cheese Packaging Brigade
materials: Cheese Packaging; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Kraft Cheese has partnered with eco-innovator TerraCycle to provide a second life for cheese packaging by converting these waste materials into fun and unique products! Every time you buy a cheese product with flexible, plastic packaging (such as string cheese) you and your organization can help divert this waste from our landfills by sending it to TerraCycle. For each approved item received your collection location will be awarded two TerraCycle points, which can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts, or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Cheese Packaging Brigade page for details."

name: Cigarette Waste Brigade
materials: Cigarette Waste; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Every year, cigarette butts end up in dumpsters and landfills, or get tossed as litter on shorelines, parks, and sidewalks across the US. With the help of Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company, a major tobacco manufacturer in the US, the waste collected through the Cigarette Waste Brigade will be recycled into a variety of industrial products, such as plastic pallets, and any remaining tobacco will be re-worked into tobacco composting. Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company markets their products only to smokers 21 years of age or older. If you or your participants do not smoke, or are under the age of 21, please visit our other Brigade programs to see how you can help the environment. Visit the Cigarette Waste Brigade page for details."

name: Cleaner Packaging Brigade

Visit the Cleaner Packaging Brigade page for details."

The Drink Pouch Brigade allows schools, non-profit organizations, or individuals to save drink pouches from taking up space in landfills. notes: TerraCycle is proud to provide a second life for inkjet and toner cartridges that are needlessly discarded every year across America. The Inkjet & Toner Cartridge Brigade is a simple way to repurpose and recycled used inkjet and toner cartridges while earning rewards for your organization or charity of choice. TerraCycle points can be redeemed for a variety of TerraCycle product bundle, charitable gifts, or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Inkjet and Toner Cartridge Brigade page for details."

notes: TerraCycle is proud to recycle iPods and MP3 players that are needlessly discarded every year across America. name: Jewelry Brigade
materials: Jewelry; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: At a time when gold and gem prices are at a historical high, your old jewelry can be converted into both cash payment and bonus TerraCycle points. Whats more, recycling your jewelry can greatly reduce the environmental and social impact on our planet and people. TerraCycle has partnered with SellYourGold.com, an industry leader with a reputation for integrity, to create the Jewelry Brigade. SellYourGold.com will appraise your jewelry within 24 hours of receipt. If you dont accept their offer, they will send back your jewelry in a secure FedEx package at no expense to you. If you do choose to accept their offer, you will receive full payment for your jewelry and an additional 2% of the value will be awarded to you in TerraCycle points. Visit the Jewelry Brigade page for details."

name: Laptop, Tablet, and E-Reader Brigade
materials: E-Readers; Laptop Computers; Tablets; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
TerraCycle is proud to recycle laptops, tablets, and e-readers that are needlessly discarded every year across America. The Laptop, Tablet, & E-Reader Brigade is a simple way to repurpose and recycle your used electronics while earning rewards for your organization or charity of choice.
Visit the <a href=http://www.terracycle.com/en-US/brigades/laptop-tablet-and-e-reader-brigade.html" target="_blank">Laptop
curbside: and E-Reader Brigade page for details."

name: Lunch Kit Brigade
materials: Lunch Kits; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Every year millions of wrappers from kids' lunches end up in dumpsters and landfills across America. TerraCycle and Lunchables Lunch Combinations are working together to make a positive contribution to the environment by minimizing trash going to landfills. The TerraCycle Lunch Kit Brigade program allows all individuals and organizations to provide a second life for used lunch kits by sending them into TerraCycle. For each approved lunchkit received, your collection location will be awarded two TerraCycle points which can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Lunch Kit Brigade page for program details."

Cameras, camcorders, GPS units, and graphing calculators accepted. Visit the Miscellaneous E-Waste Brigade page for details."

name: MOM Brands Cereal Bag Brigade
materials: Cereal Bags; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Each year, millions of cereal bags and cereal bag liners are needlessly discarded and end up in landfills. While Malt-O-Meal, Spooners, Three Sisters, Bear River Valley, and Sally's brand cereal bags create 75% less packaging waste than comparably sized cereal boxes, they want to take their commitment to creating less packaging waste one step further by partnering with TerraCycle to create a second life for all cereal bags and cereal bag liners. For each approved cereal bag and cereal bag liner received, your collection location will be awarded two TerraCycle points which can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the MOM Brands Cereal Bag Brigade page for program details."

name: Nespresso Capsule Brigade
materials: Nespresso Capsules; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Nespresso has joined with the eco-friendly innovator TerraCycle to provide a second life for used Nespresso capsules through the Nespresso Capsule Brigade. Every time you enjoy Nespresso, save the capsule and recycle it with TerraCycle. TerraCycle will collect all consumer Nespresso capsules and then recycle them into two streams. The metal capsules will be melted down and turned into new aluminum products. Residual coffee will be separated and sent to an industrial composting facility. Visit the Nespresso Capsule Brigade page for program details."
